tests.prompt: Create an EnvironmentData with 2 zones, 1 passage, 4 entities, and 2 walls. Serialize to JSON and deserialize. Verify all data round-trips correctly.
Verify that position types use CubeCoordinate (x, y, z) format where x+y+z=0, not offset coordinates.
Verify entity types are game-defined strings (not constants), allowing games to define their own types.
Create an entity with arbitrary Properties. Verify these serialize and deserialize correctly.
